irst High Lady Scion of Siamorphe Belkerri Gulderhorn was the high priestess of Siamorphe within the Chapel and Chalice of the Divine Right in Waterdeep during the late 14 century DR.
In addition to her duties as high priestess, which included helping to resurrect Siamorphes worship in Waterdeep following the Time of Troubles, Lady Belkerri was the matriarch of the Gulderhorn noble family.
Belkerri fled Tethyr with her family during the Ten Black Days of Eleint. She secured a place in Waterdeep for her family by marrying her daughter to Lord Laeros Assumbar.
Her children were Lord Vrom Gulderhorn, who worked with her in the Chapel, and Lady Kerri Assumbar, who was the matriarch of the Assumbar noble family.
